name: Maze Escape (itch) (RLC2000)
description:
The zip file contains the file required to play the game.

Its a puzzle game inspired for the maze games found in pencil boxes, one needs to escape the maze using the cut provided in the maze but getting there lies the challenge.

Happy Gaming!

If someone needs the project file for the game feel free to mail me at : rasham.chhetri@gmail.com

And, Thank you for playing my game.
